        private boolean checkEqualTicket(AgeGroup ageGroup,

                                 boolean before6,
                                 ScreeningFormat screeningFormat,
                                 int day,
                                 int i)
        Check if the criteria exist in the price table
        Parameters:
        ageGroup - The age group of purchaser
        weekday - The determinant for weekday
        before6 - The determinant for before 6
        screeningFormat - The screening format of the movie screening
        day - The day of movie screening
        i - The index of the price table
        Returns:
        A boolean to determine if the criteria exist
